title: Bug 2252Filtering is inconsistent between Navigator and Tasks views (1GEAW0O)
description: In the Navigator, the selected filters specify which files are not shown.In the Tasks view, the filters dialog lets you choose which items are shown.NOTES:NE (5/25/01 5:18:26 PM)Recommend changing Navigator filters dialog to be clearer: title should say "Navigator Filters" label should say "Hide resources matching:"
